name: Adnan Doric's Skins
tagline: Apache Flex spark button skins for Flex, AIR and mobile projects
body:
### Install
Copy the `adnandoric-skins.swc` (versioned in `/bin` folder) to your project's `/lib` folder.

### Usage
`<s:Button buttonMode="true" label="My Button" skinClass="com.adnandoric.skins.buttons.SmallBlueBtnSkin" />`

### Examples
You can see the full Flex application with examples in the following repository:
https://github.com/adnandoric/adnandoric-skins-examples

![Adnan Doric's Skins examples](https://raw.github.com/adnandoric/adnandoric-skins/master/examples/examples.jpg)

### Authors
Adnan Doric (@adnandoric)
